generated_description: pingyao tianyi hotel is a 4-star hotel located in the heart of pingyao, china. situated about 15 minutes' stroll from zhangdan pavilion, the hotel offers guests wi-fi throughout the property. the hotel features sound-proofed windows and amenities such as bath sheets and hairdryers in bathrooms. it is conveniently located near er lang temple and is within walking distance of qingxu guan and pingyao bus station. the hotel provides a range of room types, including deluxe queen, twin, and king rooms, all equipped with amenities like air conditioning, flat-screen tvs, and kitchen facilities. breakfast is served daily in the restaurant, and guests can enjoy a drink at the garden bar.
